Service Details: Fulfills individual dreams for children living with severe physical disabilities or life-threatening illnesses * helps Sunshine Kids build confidence in their ability to pursue other goals * volunteer opportunities available
Eligibility: Ages: 7 year(s) - 17 year(s)Child must have a severe physical disability or life threatening illness, be between the ages of 7 to 17th birthday, have at least the cognitive ability of a three year old, live in Canada, be able to formulate his/her own dream (this must be the dream of the child) with or without technical assistance, and have not already received a dream or wish from a similar organization (however, the child may have participated on a Sunshine DreamLift)
Address & Map: 300 Wellington St, Ste 100London, ON     N6B 2L5View MapQuest Map
